a-menu/defaultOpenKeys.description: array with the keys of default opened sub menus

a-menu/defaultSelectedKeys.description: array with the keys of default selected menu items

a-menu/forceSubMenuRender.description: render submenu into DOM before it shows

a-menu/inlineCollapsed.description: specifies the collapsed status when menu is inline mode

a-menu/inlineIndent.description: indent px of inline menu item on each level

a-menu/mode.description: type of the menu; vertical, horizontal, and inline modes are supported

a-menu/openKeys.description: array with the keys of currently opened sub menus

a-menu/selectedKeys.description: array with the keys of currently selected menu items

a-menu/subMenuCloseDelay.description: delay time to hide submenu when mouse leave, unit: second

a-menu/subMenuOpenDelay.description: delay time to show submenu when mouse enter, unit: second
